title: As BOC, I want to search for Players who were named later
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Transaction search - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2282716?projectId=14044

**AC**
- 'Player to be named later' is an option in the Transaction Type filter under Transactions search
- All transaction filters can be used for searching for these transactions. Additionally they should show up in search results when doing general transaction searches
- Results appear with the same column set as other transactions
- When listing search results, each named player has their own row. Do not include PTBNL sections where player is not yet named.

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if I name a player after the agreed on deadline to name him
custom_steps:
**AC**
When club submits the player to named, run rule checks.
Bus rule 3.04
The player must be named on or before the On/Before date agreed on for that consideration

If rule fails, show hard error for club and over-ride for BOC
"Player must be named before [On/Before Date]"

title: As a club, I want to reject a named player
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Club can hit the 'Reject' button on the PTBNL. This updates the transaction status to "Rejected"
- Page reloads for rejecting club with no buttons
- Action item is cleared from approving club's clipboard.
- The initiating Club gets a notification with Description = Player to be Named Later  is rejected by [Org]
- The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees the option to delete the named player and add a different player and re-submit

title: As BOC, I want to reject a named player
custom_steps:
**AC**
- BOC can hit the 'Reject' button on the Trade. This updates the PTBNL transaction status to "Rejected"
- Reverse all Submit updates in story #129474671 for the PTBNL
- Page reloads for BOC with updated button set as if the PTBNL was back in Preliminary
- Initiating and approving club receives a rejection notification. The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set  similar to preliminary which will allow them to delete the existing player and name a different player. 
- Initiating club can resubmit the PTBNL to "Submit to Club" state or choose to simply delete the PTBNL (but not the actual consideration itself)
- Remove transaction from approvals clipboard and from Player history
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully rejected"

title: As a Club, I want to approve a named player post-trade
custom_steps:
**Wire**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=club_approval_of_player_named

**AC**
- When the PTBNL transaction gets submitted to club, the club that the player is going to receives as action item. (Note that any other participating clubs do not get the action item)
- The Action item has type = Transaction and Description = "Player to be Named submitted to Club by [Org 3 letter abbreviation]." It also shows the player name and date/time
- Club can click on the Action item to open the Trade. They see a 'Submit to BOC' blue button and a grey Reject button under the PTBNL. 
- Approving club can edit the trade to add forms for the player and update the Received insurance form date. They cannot edit any of the player details or change the player.
- Run attach file rule checks on Save
- If Club hits Submit to BOC, the PTBNL transaction gets updated to Submitted to BOC state. 
- Page reloads without the PTBNL buttons after submission to BOC
- Player history now has an Outright Trade entry in green font for this player on the date of the PTBNL
- The action item is cleared from the club's clipboard
- BOC can perform this action on behalf of clubs
- Show blue success notification

title: As a Club,  I want to name a player post-trade
custom_steps:
**Wire**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=club_names_player

**AC**
- The Club from which the PTBNL is originating from, can view the "Name player" button in edit mode for approved transactions only.
- Button does not appear if player has already been named
- If there were multiple PTBNL from the same Org, they see a Name player button for each player

- When club selects the "Name player" option, the club can select a player. The player section fields work the same as when adding a player under Player consideration. Written consent, print/upload, Add C and Special covenant flag logic should apply
- The "From club" field is locked and shows the player's current affiliate. Pos and Roster status auto-populate
- If the player is Minor league, the "To club" field is editable so the user can select the Minor league affiliate.
- If player is MJ league, the "To Club" is locked since the player can only move to the MJ roster.
- Club can delete the player and name a different player
- Once a player is picked, the 'Submit to Club' button appears and is blue. The "Name player" button disables itself.
- Selecting 'Submit to club' will move the PTBNL transaction to 'Submitted to Club' Status. Blue notification appears and page reloads with neither button. The PTBNL is no longer editable by club
- BOC can perform this action on behalf of any club

**Note**
- 'Link Waiver Claim' option is a future enhancement

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if I name a player who was active in the Majors since the Trade was agreed on
custom_steps:
**AC**
When club submits the player to named, run rule checks.
Bus rule 3.08
Player must not have been active in the Majors since the original Trade date (have an MJ roster status of Active)

If rule fails, show hard error for club and over-ride for BOC
"Player to be named cannot be active on a Major League roster between the trade date and the Date Named"

title: As a club, I want to see rule checks on named player
custom_steps:
**AC**
When club submits a named player, run the following rule checks:
- Required field rule checks on the player that is being named. Required fields are Date, Player, To Club (if not locked)
- Repeat the following rules for club and BOC
2.03 - #126261273
2.08 - #126263553
2.18 - #126526871
2.07 - #126263069
2.16 - #126430817
2.11 - #126429621
2.20 - #126502839
2.21 - #126534297
2.17 - #126431981
2.19.1 - #134040745
2.19 - #126534133

title: As a Club, I want player's Pending Org and roster status to get updated on submitting him as a named player
custom_steps:
**AC**
When the PTBNL reaches Submitted to BOC, all AC in #129462741 and #129462861 should be met for the nominated player

title: As Boc, I want to approve a named player post-trade
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Once a PTBNL has been submitted to BOC, it appears on BOC clipboard for approval
- Clicking on the approval item opens the Trade in view mode
- BOC sees Approve and Reject buttons below the PTBNL
- Approving the PTBNL moves this transaction status to approved and the page reloads without the buttons.
- Run BOC on-submit rule checks before approval. See #129472911. In addition, also run the 2 global approval rule checks in #129463339 and #129463299
- Once the PTBNL is approved, update player's current Org and roster status. See #129463383
- All clubs can now view the named player but can no longer see the original Alt cash section. BOC continues to see this section.
- If player was on option, he must be recalled. See #128349225
- Make an entry in the Daily Transaction bulletin if player is major league #126241797
- Player history entry is now black font
- Show blue success notification on approval
